title: Encyclopedia Dramatica
summary: Encyclopedia Dramatica (ED;[6] also spelled Encyclopædia Dramatica; or referred to otherwise by the standalone ligature æ[note 1][7][8] prominently featured in its logo) is an online community centered around a wiki[9] that acts as a "troll archive".[10] It first opened under the domain name encyclopediadramatica.com on December 10, 2004.[5]
